g.text: Mandatory: Name, email, pickup library, Pin (x digits)
Name should be delivered by the Serviceplatform!
Name, email, pickup library, Pin (x digits)
No of digits in PIN is variable. Standard: 4 (Aakb: 5)
CPR, Name, email, pickup library, Pin (x digits)
Save session: Userid, LMS Patron Data
Save patron: Userid (hashed), LMS Patron Data (Name, email, blockings)
